Welcome to master-hotel’s documentation!¶

Contents:

maxdepth:2 CrudManagerBundle SecurityManager

$project¶

The startkitBundle provide a ready crud(create,edit,update,delete) Action and a security access manager to a resource(entity) in your project. The aim was to avoid code duplication. it’s not an admin generator.

Look how easy it is to use:

import project # Get your stuff done project.do_stuff()

Features¶

  • Be awesome
  • Make things faster

Installation¶

Install $project by running:

install project
